titles.title: A joint resolution to provide for the appointment of an executive secretary for the United States Capitol Preservation Commission, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Introduced in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committee.name: House Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

bill.summary: 4/14/1994--Introduced. Amends the Arizona-Idaho Conservation Act of 1988 to authorize the co-chairmen of the United States Capitol Preservation Commission to jointly appoint an executive secretary of the Commission.
